00006 #include "lsq.h"

00009 lsq::lsq() {
00010         _sqSize = 0;
00011         _sqTail = -1;
00012         _lqSize = 0;
00013         _lqTail = -1;
00014 }
00015 
00016 lsq::~lsq() {
00017         //empty for now
00018 }

00020 /***********************/
00021 /* STORE QUEUE METHODS */ 
00022 /***********************/
00023 bool lsq::isSQfull() {
00024         Assert(_sqSize <= SQ_SIZE && "ERROR: Invalid Store Queue Size");
00025         Assert(_sqSize >= 0       && "ERROR: Invalid Store Queue Size");
00026         if (_sqSize == SQ_SIZE) return true;
00027         else return false;
00028 }
00029 
00030 bool lsq::isSQempty() {
00031         Assert(_sqSize <= SQ_SIZE && "ERROR: Invalid Store Queue Size");
00032         Assert(_sqSize >= 0       && "ERROR: Invalid Store Queue Size");
00033         if (_sqSize == 0) return true;
00034         else return false;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void lsq::pushBackSQ(instruction* ins) {
00038         Assert(_sqSize < SQ_SIZE && "ERROR: Store Queue is Full");
00039 
00040         // Contruct Store Object
00041         storeObj* sObj = new storeObj;
00042         sObj->_ins = ins;
00043         sObj->_id = ins->getInsID();
00044         sObj->_committed = false;
00045         sObj->_sentToCache = false;
00046         sObj->_validEntries = false; //functino called @fetch/decode
00047         sObj->_cacheAccessLatency = 0;
00048         sObj->_storeToCacheBeginCycle = 0;
00049         sObj->_storeToCacheEndCycle = 0;
00050 
00051         // Update Store Queue
00052         _sqTail = (_sqTail+1) % SQ_SIZE;
00053         _sq[_sqTail] = sObj;
00054         _sqSize++;
00055         //printf("INSERT %d\n", _sqSize);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void lsq::popFrontSQ() {
00059         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Store Queue is Empty.");
00060         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00061         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00062         delete _sq[sqHead];
00063         _sqSize--;
00064         //printf("REMOVE %d\n",_sqSize);
00065 }
00066 
00067 instruction* lsq::getSQtail() {
00068         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00069         return _sq[_sqTail]->_ins;
00070 }
00071 
00072 instruction* lsq::getSQhead() {
00073         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Store Queue is Empty.");
00074         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00075         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00076         return _sq[sqHead]->_ins;
00077 }
00078 
00079 //NOTE: here we only update the addr (data is not modeled in this simualtor)
00080 void lsq::insertSQ_addrNdata(instruction* ins) {
00081         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Store Queue is Empty.");
00082         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00083         INS_ID insId = ins->getInsID();
00084         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00085         int counter = 0;
00086         //printf("Size: %d %d %d\n",_sqSize, _sqTail,sqHead);
00087         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00088                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00089                 //printf("%d,%d: %llx, %llx\n",counter, i, insId,_sq[i]->_id);
00090                 if (insId == _sq[i]->_id) {
00091                         Assert(_sq[i]->_validEntries == false);
00092                         _sq[i]->_memAddr = ins->getMemAddr();
00093                         _sq[i]->_validEntries = true;
00094                         //printf("\n");
00095                         return;
00096                 }
00097                 counter++;
00098         }
00099         Assert(false == true && "Operation Entry not Found in SQ");
00100 }
00101 
00102 void lsq::updateSQcommitSet(instruction* ins) {
00103         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Store Queue is Empty.");
00104         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00105         INS_ID insId = ins->getInsID();
00106         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00107         int counter = 0;
00108         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00109                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00110                 if (insId == _sq[i]->_id) {
00111                         Assert(_sq[i]->_validEntries == true && _sq[i]->_committed == false);
00112                         _sq[i]->_committed = true;
00113                         return;
00114                 } else {
00115                         //All older store ops must be committed
00116                         Assert(_sq[i]->_committed == true);
00117                 }
00118                 counter++;
00119         }
00120         Assert(false == true && "Operation Entry not Found in SQ");
00121 }
00122 
00123 bool lsq::isFrontSQdoneWritingCache(int cycle) {
00124         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Store Queue is Empty.");
00125         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00126         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00127         //NOTE: can add this line to avoid bug - seems to be unnecessary for now
00128         //if (_sq[sqHead]->_committed == false || _sq[sqHead]->_sentToCache == false) return false;
00129         return (_sq[sqHead]->_storeToCacheEndCycle == cycle);
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool lsq::lookupSQ(instruction* ins) {
00133         if (_sqSize == 0) return false;
00134         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00135         Assert(ins->getMemType() == READ);
00136         ADDRS memAddr = ins->getMemAddr();
00137         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00138         int counter = 0;
00139         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00140                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00141                 if (_sq[i]->_validEntries == true && memAddr == _sq[i]->_memAddr) {
00142                         return true;
00143                 }
00144                 counter++;
00145         }
00146         return false; //Didn't find LD mem addr in SQ
00147 }
00148 
00149 bool lsq::hasCommittedUncachedSQentry() {
00150         if (_sqSize == 0) return false;
00151         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00152         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00153         int counter = 0;
00154         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00155                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00156                 if (_sq[i]->_validEntries && _sq[i]->_committed) {
00157                         if (!_sq[i]->_sentToCache) {
00158                                 return true; //found an uncached committed ST op
00159                         }
00160                 } else {
00161                         return false;
00162                 }
00163                 counter++;
00164         }
00165         return false; //Didn't find an uncached committed ST op
00166 }
00167 
00168 ADDRS lsq::get_oldestCommittedUncachedSQentry_MemAddr(INS_ID id) {
00169         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Expected to find a committed, uncached ST op");
00170         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00171         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00172         int counter = 0;
00173         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00174                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00175                 if (_sq[i]->_validEntries && _sq[i]->_committed && !_sq[i]->_sentToCache) {
00176                         Assert(id == _sq[i]->_id);
00177                         return _sq[i]->_memAddr;
00178                 } else {
00179                         Assert(_sq[i]->_validEntries && _sq[i]->_committed && _sq[i]->_sentToCache);
00180                 }
00181                 counter++;
00182         }
00183         Assert(true == false && "Expected to find a committed, uncached ST op");
00184         return 0; //does nothing - for compiler
00185 }
00186 
00187 INS_ID lsq::get_OldestCommittedUncachedSQentry_ID() {
00188         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Expected to find a committed, uncached ST op");
00189         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00190         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00191         int counter = 0;
00192         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00193                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00194                 if (_sq[i]->_validEntries && _sq[i]->_committed && !_sq[i]->_sentToCache) {
00195                         return _sq[i]->_id;
00196                 } else {
00197                         Assert(_sq[i]->_sentToCache == true);
00198                 }
00199                 counter++;
00200         }
00201         Assert(true == false && "Expected to find a committed, uncached ST op");
00202         return 0; //does nothing - for compiler
00203 }
00204 
00205 void lsq::set_OldestCommittedUncachedSQentry_setLatency(int latency, int cycle, INS_ID id) {
00206         Assert(_sqSize > 0 && "Expected to find a committed, uncached ST op");
00207         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00208         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00209         int counter = 0;
00210         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00211                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00212                 if (_sq[i]->_validEntries && _sq[i]->_committed && !_sq[i]->_sentToCache) {
00213                         Assert(id == _sq[i]->_id);
00214                         _sq[i]->_cacheAccessLatency = latency;
00215                         _sq[i]->_storeToCacheBeginCycle = cycle;
00216                         _sq[i]->_storeToCacheEndCycle = cycle+latency;
00217                         _sq[i]->_sentToCache = true;
00218                         return;
00219                 } else {
00220                         Assert(_sq[i]->_sentToCache == true);
00221                 }
00222                 counter++;
00223         }
00224         Assert(true == false && "Expected to find a committed, uncached ST op");
00225 }
00226 
00227 bool lsq::SQhasIncompleteIns() {
00228         if (_sqSize == 0) return false;
00229         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00230         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00231         int counter = 0;
00232         while (counter < _sqSize) {
00233                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00234                 if (!_sq[i]->_validEntries || !_sq[i]->_committed) {
00235                         return true;
00236                 }
00237                 counter++;
00238         }
00239         return false;
00240 }
00241 
00242 
00243 int lsq::squashSQ(INS_ADDR insId) {
00244         Assert(_sqSize > 0);
00245         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00246         unsigned int sqHead = (_sqTail - (_sqSize - 1)) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00247         unsigned int counter = 0;
00248         //printf("%d,%d,%d,%lu\n",_sqTail,_sqSize,sqHead,insId);
00249         unsigned int oldSqTail = _sqTail;
00250         int beforeSquashSize = (int) _sqSize;
00251         while (counter < (unsigned int)_sqSize) {
00252                 unsigned int i = (sqHead+counter)%SQ_SIZE;
00253                 //if (i == sqHead) printf("%d and %d\n",_sq[i]->_id, insId);
00254                 if (_sq[i]->_id < insId) {
00255                         _sqTail = i;
00256                 } else {
00257                         Assert(i != sqHead); //impossible case
00258                         delete _sq[i];
00259                 }
00260                 counter++;
00261         }
00262         if (oldSqTail != _sqTail) {
00263                 if (sqHead == _sqTail) _sqSize = 1;
00264                 else                   _sqSize = (_sqTail - sqHead + 1) % (-1*SQ_SIZE);
00265         }
00266         //printf("%d,%d,%d\n",_sqTail,_sqSize,sqHead);
00267         int afterSquashSize = (int)_sqSize;
00268         Assert(_sqSize > 0);
00269         Assert(_sqTail >= 0 && _sqTail < SQ_SIZE);
00270         int squashInsCount = beforeSquashSize - afterSquashSize;
00271         Assert(squashInsCount >= 0);
00272         return squashInsCount;
00273 }
00274 
00275 int lsq::getSQsize() {
00276         return _sqSize;
00277 }

00279 /**********************/
00280 /* LOAD QUEUE METHODS */ 
00281 /**********************/
00282 //Check if LQ is full
00283 bool lsq::isLQfull() {
00284         Assert(_lqSize <= LQ_SIZE && "ERROR: Invalid Load Queue Size");
00285         Assert(_lqSize >= 0       && "ERROR: Invalid Load Queue Size");
00286         if (_lqSize == LQ_SIZE) return true;
00287         else return false;
00288 }
00289 
00290 //Check if LQ is empty
00291 bool lsq::isLQempty() {
00292         Assert(_lqSize <= LQ_SIZE && "ERROR: Invalid Load Queue Size");
00293         Assert(_lqSize >= 0       && "ERROR: Invalid Load Queue Size");
00294         if (_lqSize == 0) return true;
00295         else return false;
00296 }
00297 
00298 //Push element to the end of LQ
00299 void lsq::pushBackLQ(instruction* ins) {
00300         Assert(_lqSize < LQ_SIZE && "ERROR: Load Queue is Full");
00301 
00302         //printf("insert: %lu\n", ins->getInsID());
00303         // Contruct Load Object
00304         loadObj* lObj = new loadObj;
00305         lObj->_ins = ins;
00306         lObj->_id = ins->getInsID();
00307         lObj->_validMemAddrEntry = false; //functino called @fetch/decode
00308         lObj->_validDataEntry = false; //functino called @fetch/decode
00309         lObj->_sqDataFwd = false;
00310 
00311         // Update Load Queue
00312         _lqTail = (_lqTail+1) % LQ_SIZE;
00313         _lq[_lqTail] = lObj;
00314         _lqSize++;
00315 }
00316 
00317 //Dequeue the head of queue element
00318 void lsq::popFrontLQ() {
00319         Assert(_lqSize > 0 && "Load Queue is Empty.");
00320         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00321         unsigned int lqHead = (_lqTail - (_lqSize - 1)) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00322         //printf("popping: %lu\n", _lq[lqHead]->_id);
00323         delete _lq[lqHead];
00324         _lqSize--;
00325 }
00326 
00327 //Get the head of LQ
00328 INS_ID lsq::getLQheadId() {
00329         Assert(_lqSize > 0 && "Load Queue is Empty.");
00330         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00331         unsigned int lqHead = (_lqTail - (_lqSize - 1)) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00332         return _lq[lqHead]->_id;
00333 }
00334 
00335 //Insert the memory address into the corresponding LQ entry 
00336 //(CAM lookup to find element)
00337 //NOTE: here we only update the addr (data is technically updated in a later stage of pipeline)
00338 void lsq::insertLQ_addr(instruction* ins) {
00339         //printf("insert addr: %lu\n", ins->getInsID());
00340         Assert(_lqSize > 0 && "Load Queue is Empty.");
00341         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00342         INS_ID insId = ins->getInsID();
00343         unsigned int lqHead = (_lqTail - (_lqSize - 1)) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00344         int counter = 0;
00345         while (counter < _lqSize) {
00346                 unsigned int i = (lqHead+counter)%LQ_SIZE;
00347                 if (insId == _lq[i]->_id) {
00348                         Assert(_lq[i]->_validMemAddrEntry == false);
00349                         _lq[i]->_memAddr = ins->getMemAddr();
00350                         _lq[i]->_validMemAddrEntry = true;
00351                         return;
00352                 }
00353                 counter++;
00354         }
00355         Assert(false == true && "Operation Entry not Found in LQ");
00356 }
00357 
00358 //Lookup/search the LQ 
00359 //(CAM lookup to find element)
00360 //True: found a mis-speculated memory operation 
00361 //False: didn't find a mis-speculated memory operation 
00362 INS_ID lsq::lookupLQ(instruction* ins) {
00363         if (_lqSize == 0) return false;
00364         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00365         Assert(ins->getMemType() == WRITE);
00366         ADDRS memAddr = ins->getMemAddr();
00367         unsigned int lqHead = (_lqTail - (_lqSize - 1)) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00368         int counter = 0;
00369         while (counter < _lqSize) {
00370                 unsigned int i = (lqHead+counter)%LQ_SIZE;
00371                 if (_lq[i]->_validMemAddrEntry == true && _lq[i]->_sqDataFwd == false && memAddr == _lq[i]->_memAddr) {
00372                         Assert(_lq[i]->_id > 0);
00373                         return _lq[i]->_id; //oops, need to squash
00374                 }
00375                 counter++;
00376         }
00377         return 0; //all speculations are find wrt this ST op
00378 }
00379 
00380 //Find the LQ entry and update its SQ data forwardig status 
00381 //(CAM lookup to find element)
00382 void lsq::setForwardData(instruction* ins) {
00383         Assert(_lqSize > 0 && "Load Queue is Empty.");
00384         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00385         Assert(ins->getMemType() == READ);
00386         INS_ID insId = ins->getInsID();
00387         unsigned int lqHead = (_lqTail - (_lqSize - 1)) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00388         int counter = 0;
00389         while (counter < _lqSize) {
00390                 unsigned int i = (lqHead+counter)%LQ_SIZE;
00391                 if (insId == _lq[i]->_id) {
00392                         Assert(_lq[i]->_validMemAddrEntry == true && _lq[i]->_sqDataFwd == false);
00393                         _lq[i]->_sqDataFwd = true; //Store Forwarding
00394                         return;
00395                 }
00396                 counter++;
00397         }
00398         Assert(false == true && "Operation Entry not Found in LQ");
00399 }
00400 
00401 int lsq::squashLQ(INS_ADDR insId) {
00402         Assert(_lqSize > 0);
00403         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00404         unsigned int lqHead = (_lqTail - (_lqSize - 1)) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00405         int counter = 0;
00406         bool startSquash = false, oneElementLeft = false;
00407         int beforeSquashSize = (int) _lqSize;
00408         //printf("%d,%d,%d,%lu\n",_lqTail,_lqSize,lqHead,insId);
00409         while (counter < _lqSize) {
00410                 unsigned int i = (lqHead+counter)%LQ_SIZE;
00411                 //printf("%d\n",i);
00412                 if (_lq[i]->_id == insId) {
00413                         //printf("found: %d\n",i);
00414                         Assert(startSquash == false);
00415                         startSquash = true;
00416                         if (lqHead == i) {
00417                                 _lqTail = i;
00418                         } else {
00419                                 _lqTail = (i - 1) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00420                                 if (_lqTail == lqHead) oneElementLeft = true;
00421                         }
00422                 }
00423                 if (startSquash) {
00424                         Assert(_lq[i]->_id >= insId);
00425                         delete _lq[i];
00426                 }
00427                 counter++;
00428         }
00429         if (lqHead == _lqTail && !oneElementLeft) _lqSize = 0;
00430         else if (lqHead == _lqTail && oneElementLeft) _lqSize = 1;
00431         else                   _lqSize = (_lqTail - lqHead + 1) % (-1*LQ_SIZE);
00432         //printf("%d,%d,%d\n",_lqTail,_lqSize,lqHead);
00433         int afterSquashSize = (int)_lqSize;
00434         Assert(_lqSize >= 0);
00435         Assert(startSquash == true && "We must have squashed at least one LD op");
00436         Assert(_lqTail >= 0 && _lqTail < LQ_SIZE);
00437         int squashInsCount = beforeSquashSize - afterSquashSize;
00438         Assert(squashInsCount >= 0);
00439         return squashInsCount;
00440 }
00441 
00442 int lsq::getLQsize() {
00443         return _lqSize;
00444 }
